metadata.title: CVE-2020-18974 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow in Netwide Assembler (NASM) v2.15.xx allows attackers tocause a denial of service via 'crc64i' in the component 'nasmlib/crc64'.This issue is different than CVE-2019-7147.

criterions.comment: nasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
